description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A dark force has fallen over the land and it is up to you to seek out this evil and defeat it. Avatar Hollow features hack-and-slash role playing, randomly generated items, monsters and dungeons to explore. Three skill trees and many character builds. Play in PvP or Quest Mode
